title: Blood Cell
description: Josh Farewell is a three-time escapee who boasts that no prison can hold him. Once he's locked inside C-Pod at Pittman Penitentiary, surrounded by murderers and gangs, he soon realizes that his skills will be put to the test.After the inmates take over the pod in a brutal riot, they realize too late that they are not alone in C-Pod. Something is hunting the inmates. Something hungry.Surrounded by dangerous and untrustworthy felons, Josh must find a way to escape before the thing in the darkness kills them all.And the night is only beginning.
author: Shaun Tennant
